article.title: Raytheon to Provide Telemetry Rounds
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Missile Systems of Tucson, Arizona, is being awarded a contract modification of aboutÂ $9 million for procurement of 4 Griffin Block II A telemetry rounds, (part number 2292000-25), and 74 Griffin Block II A all up rounds (Part Number 2292000-26) to include shipping, engineering services, and proposal development costs. U.S. Air Force Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
